snippet.title: Sharknado's next prey: Big-screen audience
snippet.description: Syfy's social-media hit airs in theaters Friday, hoping to enter the vortex of 'Rocky Horror'-style cult classics.

snippet.title: The world is watching: Global concern, boasting, jokes over Hurricane Sandy
snippet.description: From French concerns about global warming to extremist Saudi calls for more destruction, how the world sees America's storm.

snippet.title: Spinning the number of teacher layoffs
snippet.description: FACT CHECKER | The Obama campaign inflates the number of teacher jobs lost in recent months.

snippet.title: Fact checking the ABC-Yahoo debate in Iowa
snippet.description: We look at 10 dubious or wrong-headed claims made during the debate.

snippet.title: Behind 'True Blood': Charlaine Harris discusses her Sookie Stackhouse series
snippet.description: Author Charlaine Harris chatted about writing the Sookie Stackhouse series, her latest projects and more.

snippet.title: AWESOMELY BIZARRE
snippet.description: Watching " Tim and Eric Awesome Show, Great Job! " it can be difficult to remember that you're supposed to laugh, not cringe.

snippet.title: Your Vacation in Lights: A reader's trip to Lisbon
snippet.description: Winifred Scheffler of Arlington is the latest contributor to Your Vacation in Lights, in which we invite Travel section readers to dish about their recent trips. It's a big, confusing travel world out there, and you can help your fellow travelers navigate it. You won't win a million dollars if yo...

snippet.title: The Viral Video Hall of Fame
snippet.description: There's no formula for creating a video that millions of people will be inspired to watch and tell their friends about, but if there were, it would have to include some portion of humor (often unintentional), embarrassment, obscenity, and plain old goofiness. Since the advent of YouTube in 2005,...
